attributes.action: Stop suppliers of disabled equipment charging the earth (basically, what they like!)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are very few companies who can supply good quality equipment, toys, fibre optics, ball pools etc, for the disabled and special needs but the ones that do, charge obscene amounts for things we need the most.
When one large toy cost £200 and a big ball pool is £500+, it leaves a lot of families without toys and equipment to stimulate their disabled person.
A check/audit has to be made on these companies who are ripping of the disabled.
